mapper.sql: ebsc.id AS claim_id,ebsc.bank_slip_detail_id AS claim_bank_slip_detail_id,ebsc.other_side_account_no AS claim_other_side_account_no,ebsc.customer_no AS claim_customer_no,ebsc.claim_amount AS claim_claim_amount,ebsc.claim_serial_no AS claim_claim_serial_no,ebsc.recharge_status AS claim_recharge_status,ebsc.data_status AS claim_data_status,ebsc.remark AS claim_remark,ebsc.create_time AS claim_create_time,ebsc.create_user AS claim_create_user,ebsc.update_time AS claim_update_time,ebsc.update_user AS claim_update_user
mapper.select: SELECT ,,ec.customer_name as customerName,ek3mc.k3_customer_code AS k3CustomerNo ,esc1.sub_company_name AS subCompanyName,ebs.sub_company_id AS ownerSubCompanyId,esc.sub_company_name AS ownerSubCompanyName,ebs.bank_type AS bankSlipBankType FROM erp_bank_slip_detail ebsd LEFT JOIN erp_bank_slip_claim ebsc ON ebsc.bank_slip_detail_id = ebsd.id AND ebsc.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_customer ec ON ebsc.customer_no = ec.customer_no AND ec.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_k3_mapping_customer ek3mc ON ek3mc.erp_customer_code = ec.customer_no INNER JOIN erp_bank_slip ebs ON ebsd.bank_slip_id = ebs.id AND ebs.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_sub_company esc ON esc.id = ebs.sub_company_id AND esc.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_sub_company esc1 ON esc1.id = ebsd.sub_company_id AND esc1.data_status = 1 WHERE ebsd.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ebsd.data_status = 1

SELECT count(ebsd.id) FROM erp_bank_slip_detail ebsd
AND ebsd.data_status = 1

SELECT ,,ec.customer_name as customerName FROM erp_bank_slip_detail ebsd LEFT JOIN erp_bank_slip_claim ebsc ON ebsc.data_status = 1 AND ebsd.id = ebsc.bank_slip_detail_id LEFT JOIN erp_customer ec ON ebsc.customer_no = ec.customer_no AND ec.data_status = 1 WHERE ebsd.detail_status = 2 AND ebsd.data_status = 1 AND ebsd.bank_slip_id = #{bankSlipId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT ,esc.sub_company_name AS subCompanyName FROM erp_bank_slip_detail ebsd LEFT JOIN erp_sub_company esc ON ebsd.sub_company_id = esc.id AND esc.data_status = 1 WHERE ebsd.is_localization = 1 AND ebsd.data_status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE erp_bank_slip ebs,erp_bank_slip_detail ebsd SET ebs.claim_count=claim_count-1,ebs.need_claim_count=need_claim_count+1,ebsd.update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},ebsd.update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ebsd.bank_slip_id = ebs.id AND ebsd.id = #{bankSlipDetailId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ebs.data_status = 1 AND ebsd.data_status = 1
mapper.select:
SELECT ,escLocalization.sub_company_name AS subCompanyName,ebs.sub_company_id AS ownerSubCompanyId,escOwner.sub_company_name AS ownerSubCompanyName,ebs.bank_type AS bankSlipBankType,,ek3mc.k3_customer_code AS k3CustomerNo,ec.customer_name AS customerName FROM erp_bank_slip_detail ebsd INNER JOIN erp_bank_slip ebs ON ebsd.bank_slip_id = ebs.id AND ebs.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_sub_company escOwner ON escOwner.id = escOwner.sub_company_id AND escOwner.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_sub_company escLocalization ON escLocalization.id = ebsd.sub_company_id AND escLocalization.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_bank_slip_claim ebsc ON ebsd.id = ebsc.bank_slip_detail_id AND ebsc.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_k3_mapping_customer ek3mc ON ek3mc.erp_customer_code = ebsc.customer_no LEFT JOIN erp_customer ec ON ebsc.customer_no = ec.customer_no
and ebsd.data_status = 1
and ebsd.id = #{maps.bankSlipDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and 1=2
and (CASE WHEN #{maps.currentUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} != '500001' THEN ebsc.create_user IN (select eu.id from ( select ed.id from erp_department ed
and ed.sub_company_id = #{maps.subCompanyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and ed.data_status = 1
order by ed.parent_department_id,ed.data_order desc ) department left join erp_role er on er.department_id = department.id and er.data_status = 1 left join erp_user_role eur on eur.role_id = er.id and eur.data_status = 1 left join erp_user eu on eu.id = eur.user_id order by er.data_order desc, er.create_time desc) ELSE 1=1 END )
and ebs.slip_status !=0 AND ebsd.detail_status != 5
and ebs.slip_status !=0 AND ebsd.detail_status != 5 AND (ebsd.detail_status = 1 OR ebsd.detail_status = 2 or ( ebsd.detail_status = 3 and (ec.OWNER = #{maps.currentUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or ec.union_user = #{maps.currentUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or ebsc.update_user = #{maps.currentUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or ebsc.create_user = #{maps.currentUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) and ebsc.create_user = #{maps.currentUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ebsd.is_localization = 2 and ebs.sub_company_id = 1

SELECT FROM erp_bank_slip_detail ebsd WHERE ebsd.data_status = 1 AND ebsd.trade_serial_no IN
#{tradeSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT FROM erp_bank_slip_detail ebsd WHERE ebsd.trade_serial_no = #{thirdPartyPayOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ebsd.data_status = 1
